name: Virtua Puzzle
description: Virtua Puzzle is a virtual jigsaw puzzle game.  Choose from 36 provided images or use your own to create your puzzles with your choice of difficulty.  You can configure the approximate number of pieces.  Use traditional puzzle piece shapes that are unique to each puzzle, or use one of the other, less unique shapes for greater challenge.  For less than the price of a single, physical jigsaw puzzle, you get tons of virtual puzzles.
